version_description: Bug fixes and improvements.

- Merchant lcoations on map
- List of available merhants
- List of offers
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes

- New look and feel
- User interface enhancements
- Money transfers between VIVA Cash users
- using QR code
- using phone number
- Request money from VIVA Cash users
- Bug fixes
- Performance enhancements
Bug fixes and improvements!
Minor fixes and improvements!

1. Easy and fast to navigate back and forth to explore services.
2. More convenient UI to verify the identity.
Menu items are changed to more meaningful names!
App security and performance improvements !
Crashes fixed.
Crash fixed!
Crash fixes!
Better interface to add and send money.
- UI issues fixes.

- Profile information is accessible from side menu.
- Personal QR code is accessible from side menu.
- Home menu design improvement.
- Bug fix and performance improvement.
- Flexible limit to add the money.
Now you can pay for Menatelecom more easily.

- More convenient way to login/signup
- More easy to find merchants.

- Subscribers of other mobile operators can also register to VIVA Cash.
- Shop at Bahrain’s best brands.
- Peer to Peer transfer enhancements.

- Subscribers of other mobile operators can also register to VIVA Cash.

- Minor bug fixes.
- Easy to search contacts while sending money.

You can now add your debit card to VIVA Cash
Performance enhancements and minor bug fixes
Send money internationally bug fix.

- Side menu UI improvement.
- Payment methods UI improvement.
- Now you can withdraw money from your VIVA Cash wallet through National Bank of Bahrain (NBB) ATMs
- Now send money internationally with NEC. Instant transfer to india.

- International Topup Fix
- Minor bug fixes
- Now you can fetch bank details against IFSC code for India.

- VIVA Cash is now stc pay.
- A whole new experience with an enhanced application design.
- Now you can use your Saved Debit Card for merchant and other payments.

- VIVA Cash is now stc pay.
- A whole new experience with an enhanced application design.
- Now you can use your Saved Debit Card for merchant and other payments.
- Now you can pay custom amount for stc prepaid.
Minor bug fixes.
- Minor bug fixes.
- New security feature: Now you can block access to your stc pay wallet from other devices to avoid fraudulent usage.
- Now you can send money to Egypt, UK, UAE, Oman, Kuwait and KSA through NEC Remit
Now you can get your Virtual Prepaid Card from mastercard through stc pay and shop for anything and everything online!
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.
Now you can get a virtual prepaid mastercard from NEC payments to purchase anything and everything online!

- Bahrain Bus - now you can add and recharge your Bahrain Bus GO Card
- e-Gift Voucher - receive stc pay e-Gift vouchers from your friends and family members - gift vouchers can be redeemed for Scan & Pay merchant transactions

e-Gift Voucher - send stc pay e-Gift vouchers to your friends and family members
Notification - Easy access to list of notifications by just tapping on notification banner.

- Book sanitization service for car & home directly from stc pay.
- Navigate easily to related services directly from notifications.

-Virtual card transactions is now under history section.
